 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַק‎</span>] **verb** ==gnaw== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el); **\*\***Syriac in Lexicons, and Pa\`el; but Syriac usually ***flee***, as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span>. — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֹרְקִים צִיָּה‎</span> [[Job.30.3|Job 30:3]] ***they who gnaw the dry*** (ground; figurative of scanty subsistence); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרְקַי‎</span> v[[Job.30.17|Job 30:17]] ***my gnawing*** (pains) do not sleep.
